copy: Oppenheimer Energy Ventures develops gigawatt-capacity nuclear energy projects in the United States and abroad. We enable fleet scale deployment by tailoring our approach through collaboration on site selection, permitting, and financing. In partnership with global experts and investors, we are committed to delivering affordable nuclear energy for decades to come.

quote.text: This thing will never get on the rails unless there is a place where people can talk to each other and work together. There has got to be a place where people are free to discuss what they know and what they do not know and to find out what they can.
quote.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
